resources.string:
Add a category, list item, or tag
 1 - Press the device menu button and select the appropriate ‘Add’ button.
 See the Add help page for more information.

Edit a list item
 1 - Select the item you wish to edit from the list to go to the item iformation page.
 2 - Press the edit button on the bottom of that page.
 3 - See the item information or edit help pages for further information.

View a category list
 1 - If tag names are displayed in the horizontal tabs, press the device menu button and select ‘View by Categories’.
 *The tab of the current list being displayed is highlighted. A different category list can be viewed by pressing the tab of the desired list.

View a tag list
 1 - If category names are displayed in the horizontal tabs, press the device menu button and select ‘View by Tags.
 *The tab of the current tag being displayed is highlighted. All items tagged with the current tagged with the curret tag are shown in the current list. A different tag list can be viewed by pressing the tab of the desired list.

Move an item to a different list
 1 - See Edit a Category on the edit help page.
Welcome to WeShould! This is the help text!
No categories exist. Please press the menu button and add a category.
